location.name: New New York
location.landmark: Much better than Old New York
location.desc: Built upon the ruins of Old New York after aliens invaded the planet in the year 2634.

location.name: Pimp City
location.desc: The city of Pimps. Stores around here let you buy essential pimp goods. In addition, the Pimp City Institute of Pimpness is located here so feel free to sit in on some lectures.

location.name: Hello Kitty Fortress
location.desc: The infamous impenetrable Hello Kitty fortress. Warning: do not enter without a pimp cane.

location.name: Hello Kitty Fortress
location.desc: The infamous impenetrable Hello Kitty fortress. Warning: do not enter without a pimp cane.

location.name: Little Bitaly
location.desc: A neighborhood in NNY in which a lot of robots choose to reside. Also home of the Robot Mafia so watch out!

location.name: Crack Mansion
location.landmark: You definately don't want to miss this place
location.desc: A very upscale crackhouse. "Very good sir. Shall I prewarm sir's crackpipe?"
